title: Rick Valicenti in Vancouver BC
content:
People of the 'couv, Rick Valicenti is speaking at a [GDC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805012944/http:/www.gdc.net/) gig this coming Monday, Feb 7 at the SFU Harbour Centre. Seating is limited, RSVP ASAP, OK?   
   
 [More info here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805012944/http:/www.gdc.net/chapters/bc_mainland.php?id=16&press=1&draw_column=2:3:2)
author: Zara Evens
